comments:
Eclipse Build id: 200402190800

I synchronized several projects at the same time, and there were outgoing 
changes in a few of the projects, which I committed. I noticed that there were 
2 incoming changes, and I did a "Show in Resource History" to see who made the 
changes (I was doing our build, after all, and I wanted to see who was 
releasing stuff while I was building <grin>). After noting who was guilty, I 
decided to see what the changes were, so I double-clicked on one of the 
incoming files in the synchronize view. I got the NPE walkback pasted below. I 
had to reset the sync perspective before I could compare changes again.
